Plot: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend, Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.
Title: The Way He Looks
Actors: Ghilherme Lobo, Fabio Audi, Tess Amorim, Lúcia Romano
tomatoConsensus: Compassionate, emotionally detailed, and populated with resonant characters, The Way He Looks leaves a warmth that lingers.
